job_tasks.phrase: Jij zorgt voor slimme oplossingen zodat de waardeketen van de behandelkamer tot aan het tandtechnisch laboratorium (en terug) klantgericht, snel en foutloos verloopt.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the engineer's responsibility to ensure the entire value chain operates efficiently and meets customer needs, indicating an understanding of business processes.

job_tasks.phrase: Kortom, een brede functie om in door te groeien!
job_tasks.justification: This closing statement implies a focus on career growth within the business context, hinting at business alignment.

job_tasks.phrase: Jij verbetert, vereenvoudigt en automatiseert de integraties tussen systemen, zoals de Intra Orale Scanners van de tandartsen, het datawarehouse, de contactadministratie, AI/LLM en de ERP-systemen.
job_tasks.justification: This sentence details the work of integrating various systems, including data sources like data warehouses, which falls under data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Als Automation Engineer ontwikkel en beheer je alle integraties van het IT-platform.
job_tasks.justification: The core responsibility of developing and managing IT platform integrations directly aligns with software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Het moet simpel en snel, dus digitaal!
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the digital nature of the solutions, implying software-based implementations.

job_tasks.phrase: Je overlegt hierover met de business en IT-partners.
job_tasks.justification: Consulting with business and IT partners is part of the software development lifecycle, ensuring solutions meet requirements.

job_tasks.phrase: Maar jij adviseert over toekomstige ontwikkelingen.
job_tasks.justification: Advising on future developments is a forward-looking aspect of software engineering and product strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: We doen dit met RPA en IPaaS
job_tasks.justification: RPA (Robotic Process Automation) and IPaaS (Integration Platform as a Service) are tools and methodologies used for automating and managing integrations, which often involves operational aspects.

soft_skills.phrase: Je overlegt hierover met de business en IT-partners.
Jij zorgt voor slimme oplossingen zodat de waardeketen van de behandelkamer tot aan het tandtechnisch laboratorium (en terug) klantgericht, snel en foutloos verloopt.
Het moet simpel en snel, dus digitaal!
Maar jij adviseert over toekomstige ontwikkelingen.

classification.rationale: The job mentions 'AI/LLM' but focuses heavily on automation, integration, and RPA rather than core AI/GenAI development tasks like model fine-tuning or advanced prompt engineering. The primary emphasis is on building and managing IT integrations and automation solutions.
